DoH steering in Canada Staggered starting for Nightly, Beta, and Release

arguments.userFacingDescription: Helps maintain the integrity of the DNS over HTTPS Rollout

recipe.filter_expression:
(normandy.locale in ["en-GB","en-CA","en-US"]) && (normandy.channel in ["release"]) && ((env.version|versionCompare("70.!")>=0)&&(env.version|versionCompare("71.*")<0)) && (["doh-rollout",normandy.userId]|bucketSample(0,200,10000)) && ((
    "browser.search.region"|preferenceValue == "US"
    && normandy.os.isWindows
    && "devtools.policy.disabled"|preferenceValue != true
    && "datareporting.policy.dataSubmissionEnabled"|preferenceValue != false
    && "identity.fxaccounts.enabled"|preferenceValue != false
)
|| normandy.addons["doh-rollout@mozilla.org"].isActive
|| "doh-rollout.enabled"|preferenceValue)

arguments.message: Please help make Firefox better by taking this short survey
